onboarding.title: Welcome to Aider Desk
onboarding.getStarted: Let's get started with the setup
onboarding.configureLater: You can change these settings later in the Settings panel

tips.multipleProjects: Tip: You can open multiple projects and switch between them using the tabs at the top (or CTRL+Tab).

mcp.systemPromptWarning: Warning: Modifying the system prompt can cause the MCP agent to behave unexpectedly. Only change this if you understand the implications.
mcp.computationalResources: Maximum number of iterations for MCP tool calls. Helps control computational resources.
mcp.rateLimiting: Sets the minimum time between tool calls to prevent rate limiting (e.g., for Brave or other API-constrained services).
mcp.tokensPerResponse: Maximum number of tokens the MCP agent can use per response.

aider.optionsDocumentation: Check the documentation for available options at
aider.envVarsDocumentation: Check the documentation for environment variables at

dialogs.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
dialogs.projectPathPlaceholder: Type the path to your project or use icon to browse

mcp.aiderToolsTooltip: MCP agent can use Aider to perform add/drop context files actions and run prompts.
mcp.includeFilesTooltip: Adds content of context files into the chat of MCP agent. This will increase token usage.

placeholders.0: How can I help you today?
placeholders.1: What task can I assist you with?
placeholders.2: What would you like me to code?
placeholders.3: Let me help you solve a problem
placeholders.4: Can I help you with an improvement?
placeholders.6: Can I help you optimize some algorithm?
placeholders.7: Let me help you design a new feature
placeholders.8: Can I help you debug an issue?
placeholders.9: Let me help you create a test suite
placeholders.10: Let me help you implement a design pattern
placeholders.11: Can I explain some code to you?
placeholders.12: Let me help you modernize some legacy code
placeholders.13: Can I help you write documentation?
placeholders.14: Let me help you improve performance
